opendial.bn.distribs.discrete.DiscreteDistribution

    • Uses of DiscreteDistribution in opendial.bn.distribs

      Methods in opendial.bn.distribs that return DiscreteDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DiscreteDistribution ProbDistribution.toDiscrete()
      Returns the discrete form of the distribution.

    • Uses of DiscreteDistribution in opendial.bn.distribs.discrete

      Classes in opendial.bn.distribs.discrete that implement DiscreteDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CategoricalTable
      Simple probability distribution represented as a probability table.
      class  ConditionalCategoricalTable
      Traditional probability distribution represented as a discrete probability table.
      class  DeterministicDistribution
      A deterministic distribution derived from the specification of a specific function.
      Methods in opendial.bn.distribs.discrete that return DiscreteDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DiscreteDistribution DiscreteDistribution.copy()
      Copies the distribution
      DiscreteDistribution DeterministicDistribution.toDiscrete()
      Returns itself

    • Uses of DiscreteDistribution in opendial.bn.distribs.other

      Methods in opendial.bn.distribs.other that return DiscreteDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DiscreteDistribution ConditionalDistribution.toDiscrete()
      Returns a discrete representation of the distribution.
      DiscreteDistribution MarginalEmpiricalDistribution.toDiscrete()
      Returns a discrete representation of the empirical distribution.

    • Uses of DiscreteDistribution in opendial.state.distribs

      Classes in opendial.state.distribs that implement DiscreteDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EquivalenceDistribution
      Representation of an equivalence distribution (see dissertation p. 78 for details) with two possible values: true or false.
      class  OutputDistribution
      Representation of an output distribution (see Pierre Lison's PhD thesis, page 70 for details), which is a reflection of the combination of effects specified in the parent rules.
      class  RuleDistribution
      Discrete probability distribution based on a rule specification (which can be for an update rule or a prediction rule).
      Methods in opendial.state.distribs that return DiscreteDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DiscreteDistribution EquivalenceDistribution.toDiscrete()
      Returns itself
      DiscreteDistribution OutputDistribution.toDiscrete()
      Returns itself.
      DiscreteDistribution RuleDistribution.toDiscrete()
      Returns itself
